name: 陳伶伶
objective:
本課程以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.
schedule:
本課程由Dr.Tseng 和Dr. Amy Chen 合上，課程進度與安排調整如下：

09/22：Introduction (Dr. Amy Chen)
09/29~11/03：Dr. Tseng
09/29：Introduction, Definition, Units
10/06：Sources, Sinks
10/13：Health Effect (Pass HW1)
10/20：Air Quality Standards, Criteria, Index (HW1 due)
10/27：Laws and Regulations 1 (Pass HW2)
11/03：Laws and Regulations 2 (HW2 due)
11/10~01/19：Dr. Amy Chen
11/10：Presentation per person：paper review (期中報告)
11/17：Mid Term (Dr. Tseng) (期中考試)
11/24：Strategy Tools of Air Quality Management
12/01：Air Quality Monitoring 
12/08：Air Quality Modeling
12/15：Stationary & Fugitive Source Management
12/22：Term Project 1：Problem-based learning part 1 (分組報告1)
12/29：Mobile Source Management
01/05：Term Project 2：Problem-based learning part 2 (分組報告2)
01/12：Regional and Global air pollution
01/19：Final Exam (Dr. Amy Chen) (期末考試)
